participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys artistic pursuits and values relaxing experiences.
participant_1.background: I usually wear comfortable clothes when I visit India because I am there to relax. I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard. I enjoy making 3D models for video games and animations. I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery. I recently had knee surgery.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Sociable and laid-back, loves spending time with friends and exploring creative hobbies.
participant_2.background: I like to spend time with my friends, especially Abigail. I love 3D modelling in my spare time. I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go. I enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee. I am from a small town in the Midwest where life is slower and more relaxed.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a big fan of 3D modeling. What's your favorite part of the process?
Hi! I'm also a fan of 3D modeling. I think my favorite part is the creative freedom.
I agree, it's so much fun to be able to create anything you can imagine. What kinds of things do you like to model?
I like to model characters and creatures, mostly. I'm also working on a 3D model of my friend Abigail.
That's awesome! I've never tried modeling a person before.
It's not too hard, but it can be time-consuming.
I'm sure it is. I'm still learning the ropes.
Well, if you ever want some help, I'm always here.
No problem! Have you ever been to the West Coast?
No, I haven't. I've always wanted to go, though.
It's beautiful out there. I'm from a small town in the Midwest, so it's a lot different.
I can imagine. I'm from a small town in the South, so I'm not used to big cities.
I've never been to the South. I've heard it's really pretty.
It is. There's a lot of history and culture.
Well, I'm sure it's a lot different from the Midwest.
It is. But I think you'd like it.
Maybe I'll have to visit sometime.
